Have a few minutes, soldier? I have a mission that requires ability and brains. I hear you have both.

The local {@LinkCreature:30#10#ashpelt gorillas} are being overrun by aggressive, invasive sloths. No, really. Sloths.

The gorillas don't attack unless provoked, but the sloths are fiercely territorial! "How can I help?"

We're gathering gorillas in a protected area by the Bastion's gates to save the population.

Take one of these fruits that the gorillas like and lead one of them into the enclosure. We'll do the rest.

The {@LinkCreature:30#10$$gorillas} are gentle, but watch out for sloths.

(The gorilla's eyes are locked on the fruit, but it seems nervous about coming too close.)

(If you move slowly toward the enclosure, it should follow.)

Handsome creatures, aren't they?

A shame the sloths are driving them off.

Even the naturalists among us would be quite happy if those clawed nightmares died off.
